synopsis.text: Hokuto Shinken's new master, Kenshiro, suffers a crushing defeat by Nanto Koshu Ken's successor, Shin, resulting in seven debilitating chest wounds and the loss of his beloved Yurie. As the world spirals into chaos and people yearn for a savior, Kenshiro resolves to reclaim his love and stand up as humanity's beacon of hope. Set between Kenshiro's downfall and the start of the manga, this prequel explores his transformation into a legendary hero amidst a violent, post-apocalyptic world. Witness Kenshiro's fight for survival, love, and redemption as he faces formidable foes and becomes the long-awaited miracle for a desperate world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
